message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $140. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $135.  It's still a good price for the quality of the product.
I understand your position, Alice. I am now willing to pay $132 for the product.
Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $133.  This is a fair price for both of us.
